element.name: Fox
element.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

description.p: The white arctic foxes of Icewind Dale live in burrows and are acclimated to cold weather. They prowl the outskirts of Ten-Towns and nearby forests for food, hunting hares or stealing fish. These timid creatures avoid contact with humanoids, but they are sometimes used as mounts by chwingas.

element.name: Keen Senses
element.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

description.p: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

sheet.description: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

element.name: Bite
element.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

description.p: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

sheet.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

element.name: Hare
element.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

description.p: Snowshoe hares are gentle herbivores that live in burrows throughout Icewind Dale. They have shorter ears than other hares and are acclimated to cold weather.

element.name: Escape
element.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

description.p: The hare can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

sheet.description: The hare can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
